Key Match Events: Pete Alonso hit a three-run home run in the ninth inning to give the Mets a 4-2 lead
Brice Turang grounded into a game-ending double play to secure the Mets' win
Pre-Game Insights: The Mets went 1-5 versus the Brewers in the regular season
Jose Quintana started for the Mets, while Tobias Myers started for the Brewers
Post-Match Reflections: The Mets will face the Philadelphia Phillies in the NL division series
Miscellaneous Highlights: Jesse Winker spiked his helmet after scoring a run
The Empire State Building was lit up in blue and orange to celebrate the Mets' playoff series win
